CHEMICALS

lsd

Modern humans must learn how to relate to psychoactives responsibly, treating them with respect and awareness, working to minimize harms and maximize benefits, and integrating use into a healthy, enjoyable, and productive life.

                    This chunk appears within the Erowid Library Index, listing book resources (by author, subject, and online books such as PiHKAL, TiHKAL, Shulgin Lab Books, E for Ecstasy), followed by site-related links (FAQ, support, newsletters, contact), and transitions into the section on chemicals (specifically LSD), including responsible use messaging and links to articles on LSD health and pharmacology.
